effect: [Main] You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards: If the number of DON!! cards on your field is equal to or less than the number on your opponent's field and you only have Characters with a type including "GERMA", add up to 2 DON!! cards from your DON!! deck and rest them. [Counter] Your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.
